ul.li: Added ability to export history data as JSON file recognizable by the app
"Save request dialog" will open only once pressing CTRL+S couple of times.
Fixed Issue 174: If-Modified-Since format now follow RFC.
Fixed Issue 177: New Feature Request for improved linkifying to suit Django + TastyPie.
Added CodeMirror support for payload panel (experimental - enable it in setting page).
Improvements in CodeMirror headers support - enabled autocomplete feature, better code highlighting
CodeMirror upgrade to v3.12
Added "options page" to app's manifest. Right click on the app icon to enter options page.
Fixed Issue 155: Default "Content-Type" header can't be saved
Changed JSON response view
Added hide option for response headers.
Added options menu for URL panel (hover URL and then setting icon).
Fixed Issue 137: Escaping ⟨ ⟩ in header response.
Link to "open in JSON tab" is now always visible in "Parsed" tab.
Fixed issue with handling error during app definition download.
Added support for networks where contact to app server is impossible.
Fixed Haved and History view when there is no items.
Fixed Issue 129: Allow deletion and renaming of projects
Fixed Issue 121: Project are not exporting
Fixed Issue 132: User-Agent changes persists. (Chrome >= beta)
Header of the request view now include a request name (if any).
Fixed Issue 129: Combobox to select requests in project always selects the first item
Fixed Issue 128: Mutlipart Boundary not sent in request body when file is not attach using mutlipart/form-data
Fixed Issue 117: How do you delete a project ?
When multipart/form-data is selected as a content-type the app will parse payload data from the form tab in proper way (including boundary section)

When response content-type header is javascript you will be able to open result in JSON tab (link on the top of the "parsed" tab). Facebook API do not set right JSON header and response is parsed as a JavaScript.
